name: Shūkaku
description:
Milo the Mouse is trying to get back home! 

It's dangerous for harvest mice such as Milo out in the world. He needs to avoid touching the ground to avoid predators. Fortunately, there is always a trail there to lead him through the different fields. 

First, help Milo pass through a wheat field, then skip through a grassy forest before plowing through a corn field, stomp through a squash patch and finally dance through a field of flowers. 

Learn more about Milo's species here: https://rangerrick.org/ranger_rick/harvest-mice/

Credits:
Font created by Nirmana Visual, all other assets were created by me.
